name: @react-native-community/status-bar
description: Native module for mutating status bar state

scripts.bundle:e2e:android: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform android --dev false --entry-file example/index.js --bundle-output .tmp/android-bundle.js
scripts.bundle:e2e:ios: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform ios --dev false --entry-file example/index.js --bundle-output .tmp/ios-bundle.js

author: Dmitriy Kovalenko <dmtr.kovalenko@outlook.com>

ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/StatusBarExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme StatusBarExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES| xcpretty -k
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/StatusBarExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme StatusBarExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone X

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && popd
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && popd
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD
